subject: Sales
title: The Origin Story
description: A 60-second lesson on The Origin Story.

hook.text: Jobs didn't say 'We make computers.' He said 'Two friends started in a garage to change the world.'

buildup.text: An origin story humanizes a brand. It replaces corporate polish with authenticity and real purpose.

discovery.text: Buyers connect with why you started, not what you sell. Purpose builds emotional loyalty beyond features.

twist.text: The best origin stories include struggle. Perfection bores people. Vulnerability makes brands relatable.

climax.text: Craft your company's origin story. Lead with the problem that inspired everything. Buyers will lean in.

punchline.text: People don't buy what you make. They buy why you started.

quiz.question: What makes an origin story compelling?
